A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntaryl unpaid work.you would like to do some voluntaryl unpaid work at the museum.
write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntaryl unpaid work.
in your letter
explain why you want to do voluntaryl unpaid work at the museum
describe some skills and qualities you have that would be usful
give detail of when you would be available for work
text: I hope this letter finds you well.I am writing this letter to say why I want to volunteer for this situation and I should discuss my abilities and my experience with this category activity.

Firstly, I want to say I have been working in the museum for 2 years when I was youngest and I am extremely happy when I can help other people ,especially in the museum because I fully enjoy historically and I can learn any more very soon, for this reason, it my favourite job and I should say It has been important if I cannot make money.
After ,that I am going to discuss my ability and I have good experience in this job in the past and also I can speak 3 languages and I believe this subject help me when you have foreign tourists.
Moreover, I am not really busy so I can spend a lot of time in the museum and in addition my home is entirely nearby here so lots of time I am available for work.
Looking forward to receiving your reply.
